title: Swap Maui Lane header logo to user-provided asset

requirements.summary: Update the app header logo to use the user-provided image and ensure all UI references point to the new logo asset path.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo in `frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShell.tsx` displays the user-provided logo image.
No part of the UI references non-existent or outdated logo filenames (e.g., `/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo-v2.dim_512x512.png`) after the change.
The logo `alt` text remains in English and continues to read "Maui Lane Care Home".

file_operations.description: Rename the existing generated logo asset to the new user-provided logo filename so the app can reference the updated asset consistently.
Replace the file contents with the user-provided logo image while keeping the same filename and dimensions suffix.

Update the header to reference `/assets/generated/maui-lane-logo-provided.dim_512x512.png` instead of any outdated logo filename, while preserving `alt="Maui Lane Care Home"` and leaving authentication gating/routing unchanged.
